entry.title: Indian Crypto Market Suffers Significantly ‚Äî Experts Say Trading Volumes Unlikely to Recover Anytime Soon
entry.summary:
Crypto trading volumes in India have plunged significantly this year. The FTX meltdown has exacerbated the problem, hurting ‚Äúthe sentiment across crypto tokens.‚Äù Local crypto experts are not expecting a recovery in the near future ‚ÄúUnless something dramatic happens‚Äù in the upcoming Union Budget.
Indian Crypto Market ‚ÄòDead‚Äô Since April, Says Expert
Cryptocurrency trading volumes at major exchanges in India have plunged significantly this year. Since the collapse of crypto exchange FTX, major exchanges in India lost between 34% and 50% of trading volumes, Moneycontrol reported Monday, citing data from research firm Crebaco. However, the decline began long before the FTX implosion. One of the largest crypto trading platforms in India, Wazirx, lost 97.99% of its trading volumes from the be‚Ä¶

HSBC‚Äôs Trademark Applications for Crypto-Related Products and Services
HSBC has filed two crypto-related trademark applications for its name and logo with the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO). Mike Kondoudis, a USPTO-licensed trademark attorney, noted in a tweet Friday that HSBC‚Äôs trademark applications indicate the bank‚Äôs plans for a number of digital products and services, including those related to the exchange and transfer of virtual currencies.

entry.title: Hoskinson Says ADA Not Being Listed On Gemini Is A ‚ÄòGood Thing‚Äô, Here‚Äôs Why
entry.summary:
Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson has shared his thoughts on ADA not being listed on the Gemini crypto exchange. Where such an exchange not listing a high-ranking digital asset such as ADA would usually draw criticism, Hoskinson does not seem to mind this and instead welcomes it.
No Need To Be On Gemini
Gemini crypto exchange is one of the large exchanges that are yet to have Cardano for trading on its platform. The exchange which currently lists more than 110 coins, the majority of those being assets with a lower market cap than Cardano, has dragged its feet on listing ADA but founder Charles Hoskinson is not stressing it.
Jumping on a Twitter Space that was held on Sunday with his brother William, Hoskinson told his over 9,000 listeners that the digital asset was not being listed‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
Two prominent Solana projects have announced they are transitioning over to new blockchains. The non-fungible token (NFT) venture Degods detailed it will be moving to the Ethereum chain and the Y00ts NFT team detailed it is moving to Polygon. Both teams said the transitions will take place in 2023.
Degods Says NFT Project Will Move to Ethereum, Y00ts Details NFT Venture Is Transitioning to Polygon
The crypto community has been discussing two crypto projects that have said the teams plan to transition their ventures from the Solana blockchain network to an alternative blockchain. Degods is one NFT project that revealed on Twitter it was moving from Solana to the Ethereum network. Launched in October 2021, Degods is an NFT venture that created 10,000 deflationary PFP (profile picture) NF‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
Gold prices are ending the year a hair below the values recorded 12 months ago. Statistics on Dec. 26, 2021, show the U.S. dollar value per ounce of gold was $1,810 per unit, and today gold is $1,797 per ounce. Silver, on the other hand, managed to increase a hair in value since last year, as prices climbed from $23.04 per unit to the current USD value of around $23.72 on Dec. 26, 2022.
Gold Dropped a Hair During the Last Year, While Silver Rose a Touch ‚Äî Precious Metal Assets Managed to Hold Value All Year Long Despite the Macroeconomic Calamity and Energy Crisis

entry.title: Ethereum Bearish Signal: Network Demand Remains Low
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the demand on the Ethereum network has continued to drop recently, a sign that could be bearish for the asset‚Äôs value.
Ethereum Total Transaction Count Continues To Go Down
As pointed out by an analyst in a CryptoQuant post, the ETH transaction count has observed a significant plunge recently. The ‚Äútransaction count (total)‚Äù is an indicator that measures the total number of transfers taking place on the Ethereum blockchain on any given day.
When the value of this metric is high, it means traders are active on the network right now. On the other hand, low values imply the chain is seeing low activity at the moment. Now, here is a chart that shows the trend in the 30-day Exponential Moving Average (EMA) version of this indicator over the last couple of years:
‚Ä¶

entry.title: Biggest Movers: LTC Climbs to 10-Day High on Monday
entry.summary:
Litecoin raced to a ten-day high to start the week, as markets returned from the Christmas holiday weekend. The token extended recent gains to start the week, and neared a key resistance point in the process. Xrp was also higher, as it also collided with a price ceiling.
Litecoin (LTC)
Litecoin (LTC) was one of the notable gainers on Monday, as the token raced to a ten-day high.
LTC/USD rose to a high of $70.83 to start the week, which comes less than a day after hitting a low of $65.54.
Today‚Äôs surge has taken litecoin to its highest point since December 16, and closer to a key resistance level of $72.00.
As can be seen from the chart, Monday‚Äôs move comes as the 14-day relative strength index (RSI) rose above its own ceiling at 45.00.
The index is currently tracking at 51.79, with the next visible point of support at the 54.00 level.
Should the RSI reach this point, it is highly likely that prices will also collide with a ceiling of $72.00.
XRP
XRP, formerly ripple, also moved higher to start the week, as the token collided with a key resistance point.
Following a low of $0.3447, XRP/USD hit a high of $0.356 earlier in today‚Äôs session, which is also a recent price ceiling.
Monday‚Äôs gain is the highest point that XRP has hit since December 18, and comes as traders returned from the Christmas holiday weekend.
Looking at the chart, this move accompanied a recent move beyond a ceiling on the RSI of 42.00.
As of writing, the index is now tracking at 43.45, which is its strongest point since December 15.
Ultimately, should this trend continue, XRP could continue to move towards the $0.4000 mark.
Register your email here to get weekly price analysis updates sent to your inbox:
Do you expect crypto markets to move higher heading into the new year? Let us know your thoughts in the comments.

entry.title: A Christmas Gift From Peter Schiff, ‚ÄòSell Your Bitcoin‚Äô
entry.summary:
Economist Peter Schiff has told bitcoin investors to sell off their holdings. Schiff continues to staunchly oppose the cryptocurrency which he believes holds no intrinsic value. His most recent advice to investors comes right on Christmas Day when the festivities have pulled the market into a lull.
Time To Sell Bitcoin
Taking to Twitter, Peter Schiff posted what he called his ‚ÄúChristmas gift‚Äù to bitcoin investors. The post followed the usual trend of bashing BTC, with a chart that he used to support his claim. The chart which shows the trend of the digital asset over the last six months pointed out that a support level had been turned into resistance.
Schiff said the chart shows that ‚Äúbitcoin is much closer to its ceiling than it is to its floor.‚Äù As such, he believes that there is‚Ä¶

entry.title: Monthly NFT Sales Are 80% Lower Than Last Year, Digital Collectibles Interest Plummeted in 2022
entry.summary:
Like most crypto projects this year, non-fungible tokens (NFTs) felt the pain of 2022‚Äôs crypto winter as sales are down a great deal and blue-chip NFTs have been slashed in value. For instance, last month, there was roughly $534 million in NFT sales compared to the $2.77 billion in NFT sales sold in Dec. 2021.
The NFT Industry Takes a Hit in 2022 ‚Äî Sales and Google Searches Down Significantly
2022 hasn‚Äôt been kind to non-fungible token (NFT) holders, and statistics show that interest in the subject has dropped a great deal this year. Google Trends (GT) data shows that the search term ‚ÄúNFT‚Äù had a score of around 52 during the week of Dec. 26, 2021 ‚Äì Jan. 1, 2022. The term also skyrocketed to the highest score of 100 on Jan. 16 ‚Äì Jan. 22, 2022.

entry.summary:
According to court documents filed on Friday, Caroline Ellison, a longtime confidante of FTX‚Äôs former CEO Sam Bankman-Fried, has revealed that¬†she and Bankman-Fried conspired to defraud the exchange‚Äôs investors, lenders, and consumers.
In a report by Reuters, Bankman-Fried and other FTX executives received billions of dollars in clandestine loans from the crypto billionaire‚Äôs Alameda Research, Ellison who is the former CEO of the crypto trading firm, told a judge when she pleaded guilty to her involvement in the implosion of the exchange.
Bankman-Fried faces a multitude of criminal accusations related to allegations that he stole billions of dollars from FTX customers in light of this revelation.

entry.title: As Financial Surveillance Intensified In 2022, Bitcoin Is Needed By Individuals And Nations Alike
entry.summary:
A rise in financial censorship this year, perpetrated by citizens‚Äô own governments and adversarial nations alike, calls for Bitcoin. This is an opinion editorial by Kudzai Kutukwa, a financial inclusion advocate who was recognized by Fast Company magazine as one of South Africa‚Äôs top-20 young entrepreneurs under 30.
‚ÄúEvery record has been destroyed or falsified, every book rewritten, every picture has been repainted, every statue and street building has been renamed, and every date has been altered. And the process is continuing day by day and minute by minute. History has stopped. Nothing exists except an endless present in which the Party is always right.‚Äù ‚ÄìGeorge Orwell, ‚Äú1984‚Äù

entry.title: French Clients File Complaint against Binance over Crypto Promotions
entry.summary:
A group of French investors who were previously clients of Binance has filed a complaint against the top cryptocurrency exchange for allegedly illegally promoting its digital asset services in France between December 19, 2020, and May 4, 2022. The clients alleged that this was before Binance was granted permission from the country‚Äôs financial markets regulator to offer digital asset services in the country.

Lawyers involved in the case told Reuters that the plaintiffs accused Binance of having a ‚Äúmisleading commercial practice.‚Äù According to local media Mediapart, the investors claimed that they lost over ‚Ç¨2.4 million in the aftermath of

entry.title: Bitcoin 7-Day Hashrate Down To September Levels As US Storm Disrupts Miners
entry.summary:
Data shows the 7-day average Bitcoin hashrate has now fallen to lows not seen since September, as blizzards temporarily disrupt miners in the US.
Bitcoin Mining Hashrate Has Shown Wild Fluctuations Recently
The last few days have seen extreme cold-weather conditions across the US, causing power and road-related disruptions, as well as claiming the lives of at least 37, as per a report. Even the BTC hashrate has felt an impact from this winter storm. The ‚Äúmining hashrate‚Äù is an indicator that measures the total amount of computing power currently connected to the Bitcoin network.
When the value of this metric goes up, it means miners are bringing more machines online on the blockchain right now. Such a trend shows miners are finding the current network attractive to mine on. On the ot‚Ä¶

Trading volume typically slows down during the holiday period, with most financial markets shutting down.
Cryptocurrency markets however remained open, with BTC/USD moving closer to recapturing the $17,000 level.

entry.title: Ukrainian Steals Bitcoin From Russian Darknet Market, Donates to Charity
entry.summary:
A Ukrainian living in the U.S. has reportedly hacked a major drug market on the Russian dark web, diverting some of its crypto proceeds. The man says he donated the digital cash stolen from the illicit website to an organization delivering humanitarian aid across his war-torn homeland.
Wisconsin Resident With Ukrainian Roots Hacks Russian Dark Web Market Solaris
Ukrainian-born cyber intelligence expert Alex Holden, who left Kyiv as a teenager in the 1980s and now lives in Mequon, Wisconsin, claims he has hacked into Solaris, one of Russia‚Äôs largest online drug markets, Forbes informs in a report.
Supported by his team at Hold Security, he was able to get hold of some of the bitcoin sent to dealers and the darknet site‚Äôs owners. The cryptocurrency, worth over $25,000, was later transf‚Ä¶

entry.summary: The now-bankrupt crypto exchange FTX reportedly funded 94% of its Blockfolio acquisition using its native FTT token.

entry.title: British Columbia Suspends New Connections for Bitcoin Miners
entry.summary: British Columbia is putting an 18-month moratorium on new requests to hook up crypto mining operations to the province‚Äôs electrical grid.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Arrives in US to 'Face the Music' of Federal Fraud Charges
entry.summary: SBF landed in New York on Wednesday evening to face multiple federal wire fraud, securities fraud, and money laundering charges.

entry.title: Caroline Ellison, Gary Wang Plead Guilty, Cooperating in FTX Investigation
entry.summary: The Justice Department, SEC, and CFTC announce charges against the pair as Sam Bankman-Fried is en route to the U.S. to face trial.

entry.title: Retiring U.S. Sen. Pat Toomey Introduces Stablecoin TRUST Act
entry.summary: As one of his last acts in office, the Pennsylvania Republican introduces a bill to legitimize the use of stablecoins in payment systems.

entry.title: Hardware Wallet Startup Cypherock Raises $1M to Skip Seed Phrases
entry.summary: The firm‚Äôs new hardware wallet uses encrypted NFC-based cards to reduce risks related to seed phrases.

entry.title: The Biggest NFT Collections of 2022
entry.summary: Punks? Apes? Azuki? Find out which projects racked up the largest trading tallies in an up-and-very-down year for NFTs.

entry.title: Who Lost the Least? Top Performing Crypto Assets of 2022
entry.summary: Bitcoin‚Äôs heavy price depreciation over the year was reflective of a general trend. Still, a few tokens weathered the industry storm well.

entry.title: How Tezos Was Ahead of the Proof-of-Stake Merge: Web Summit 2022
entry.summary: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman talks about how the Tezos blockchain has used a proof-of-stake mechanism since its inception, her admiration for Tendermint, Ethereum and sharding, progressive decentralization, and NFT gaming with Decrypt's Stephen Graves onstage at Web Summit in Lisbon.

entry.title: gm: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce Critiques SEC's Approach to Crypto
entry.summary: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce has been an outspoken advocate for crypto and a candid critic of her own agency‚Äôs approach to regulating crypto markets. In an extensive chat with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott she discussed FTX, Gary Gensler, DeFi, and the problems with the Howey Test. Don‚Äôt miss this conversation for the inside take on the SEC‚Äôs thinking on crypto‚Äîstraight from the source. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse
entry.summary: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried‚Äôs mismanagement, ‚Äúdecentralization theater,‚Äù Tezos‚Äôs reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit
entry.summary: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year
entry.summary: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award
entry.summary: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year
entry.summary: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award
entry.summary: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award
entry.summary: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year
entry.summary: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year
entry.summary: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
entry.summary: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.

entry.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business‚Äîplus misconceptions in the crypto space.

entry.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch
entry.summary: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.

entry.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he‚Äôs looking forward to in Web3.
